name: .text
description: Get or set every element's text content

arguments.name: getTextAsArray
arguments.description: If `true`, an array will be returned with each element's text content; otherwise, a string containing the text content of each element concatenated will be returned.

arguments.name: setTextContentTo
arguments.description: The text to set each element's text content to. This will be cast to a string.

returns: An array containing or string formed from all elements' text content
